signals.problem_statement: The customer needs to understand how email deletions in Hiver affect their Outlook inbox.
signals.context: Public institution, evaluating integration with Outlook/Microsoft 365.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires detailed information on security risks and technical feasibility for integrating Hiver with their existing systems.
signals.context: Public institution, needs IT approval for platform implementation.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the lack of synchronization of tags and organization between Hiver and Outlook.
signals.context: Public institution, evaluating integration with Outlook/Microsoft 365.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs extended access to the sandbox environment for their team to finalize their evaluation.
signals.context: Public institution, team needs more time to test the platform.
